Information.accountdisc: Creating your account for the first time is quick and easy! Please, enter your name and your current email. Choose your password wisely and confirm it. You can select your country by writing it or by the drop-down menu. Oh, don't forget to inform us of your gender. You'll be ready to sign up after accepting the terms.
Information.globalNewsdisc: Let's check what's poppin', shall we? Here you get the most recent posts from all the different groups' interests you're part of! What about sharing your ideas in one of them? Pictures, videos, and .pdf documents are also welcome.
Information.creatingGroupdisc: Imagine having like-minded people all together in a single place. By creating a group, this idea is all possible! For that, upload a picture and add a name that best defines the group. Then, let the users know what it is about by writing a description. Rules can be necessary in case you want to show them what it's allowed or not! Choose the city you're a fan of and the category that better describes the group.
Information.joiningGroupsdisc: Once you tap here, you will automatically send a request to join the group and start connecting with like-minded people.
Information.managingGroupdisc: Inside each group, you have the following sections: news feed, private messages, and audio discussions. As an admin, you are in charge of every action happening around there, including deleting publications that aren't according to the rules. Also, you're able to decide who joins or not the group.
Information.privateMessagesdisc: And why not create a private conversation with one or more people you choose? The subject is all up to you. By tapping in 'Create a New Conversation', you'll be able to inform the subject and add the members to share text, photos, videos, and even document sheets.
Information.audioConverdisc: In this section, you can either chat with other users or just listen to them. By creating a room, it's possible to have calls and conversations with the ones you selected.
Information.sponsoreContentdisc: How about promoting an interesting post of your preference? In this section, every user can be an advertiser and pay for the publication they want to, which can have a higher range and more users reached. Oh, and don't worry, you don't need to be a company or influencer for that to happen! To sponsor a post, all you must do is to choose the best payment method for you.
Information.menudisc: Group information contains all relevant details about the group you are in, such as description, rules, and all the members. There, it's possible to find every media and document sent along the chat rooms. By tapping on Suspend Notification, all further notifications in the group will be snoozed.
Information.searchingFielddisc: Are you wondering if that person is part of our team? Or maybe a specific hashtag after that match? Well, let's cut to the chase! Here, you can manage the option that better describes what you're looking for: users, posts by hashtags, or groups name.
Information.yourProfiledisc: Let's manage your account, shall we? Here you take a previous look at how others can see your profile. This is the place where you can find the groups you're part of, your profile description and all your friends! Also, you can view the posts you have saved.
Information.pointsdisc: Every action on the app is rewarded : the more you interact with a content, the more your points will increase! Each comment, like, share and post will earn you points, which will allow you to grow on the app. A new level means access to additional features. Your points can also be used as a currency to pay for your sponsor content.
